mapper.select: SELECT COMMENT_ID, WRITER, CONTENT, REG_DATE, COMMENT_REF, COMMENT_LEVEL, BOARD_ID FROM (SELECT rownum AS SEQ, COMMENT_ID, WRITER, CONTENT, REG_DATE, COMMENT_REF, COMMENT_LEVEL, BOARD_ID FROM COMMENTS START WITH COMMENT_REF IS 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR COMMENT_ID = COMMENT_REF) WHERE SEQ BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end};
mapper.insert: insert into comments (comment_id, content, writer, reg_date, file_name, comment_ref, comment_level, board_id) values(comments_seq.nextval, #{content}, #{writer}, sysdate, #{fileName}, #{commentRef}, #{commentLevel}, #{boardId} )
mapper.delete: delete from boards where board_id=#{boardId} and writer=#{writer}
